title: Trimester 2 Final Review & Modern Banking

sections.title: Digital Banking Journey
sections.content:
This trimester, you moved from traditional banking to the digital world. You can now manage your finances using modern apps and tools.

- **Digital UI**: Navigating apps (top, bottom, buttons).
- **Fintech Adjectives**: Describing services (user-friendly, secure, encrypted).
- **Digital Payments**: Transfers, subscriptions, and auto-pay.
- **Security**: 2FA, strong passwords, and virtual cards.
- **Data**: Reading statements and spending charts.

sections.title: Preparing for the Capstone
sections.content:
Review these key questions for your final evaluation:
1. **How much is the balance?** (Asking for totals)
2. **Is the transfer instant?** (Checking speed)
3. **Is my password strong?** (Security check)
4. **Could I have a refund?** (Polite requests)
5. **Where is the download button?** (UI navigation)

objectives: Summarize all digital banking concepts from the second trimester
Identify modern financial tools and security practices
Prepare for the final capstone project and trimester exam
